txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken short bows from the intelligent foes in Agamaur. Bring them to Eriac the Strong at the Eglain-camp in Agamaur.
'They will go with the trophies they earned in their final battle, thanks to you.\n\n'Thank you.'
'Warriors require trophies, and our fallen number need to be buried well. In our haste to retreat here, we left much behind. Can you help to attain rewards for our fallen?'
Eriac the Strong, at the Eglain-camp in Agamaur, desires broken short bows from the intelligent foes found in Agamaur.
Deliver the broken short bows to Eriac the Strong at the Eglain-camp at Agamaur
You accepted a task from Eriac the Strong to acquire broken short bows from the intelligent foes within Agamaur. You can find Eriac the Strong within the Eglain-camp at Agamaur.
Wanted: Broken short bows from the intelligent foes in Agamaur.
